programmes.show_description: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too!
Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.
Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.
From chic cross-body bags to must-have trainers, tune in to discover our range of everyday accessories and learn how to style them with your favourite outfits to elevate your daytime looks instantly.
Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
Go on, give your wardrobe a refresh with our stylish selection from JDY, a fashion brand dedicated to creating pieces that showcase your individuality.
Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.
Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.
From chic cross-body bags to must-have trainers, tune in to discover our range of everyday accessories and learn how to style them with your favourite outfits to elevate your daytime looks instantly.
Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too!
Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.
Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.
Relax in style with our wonderful selection of loungewear. Wonderfully warm separates in cosy fabrics will help you to make the most of your downtime.
Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.
Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too!
Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts!
Get your garden ready for spring! Join us to explore the best seasonal essentials and tips to refresh your outdoor haven.

Tune in and discover trendy fashion with Izabel London. Whether you're shopping for a holiday, wedding or your daily wardrobe, we'll be showcasing pieces that'll help you feel your fashionable best.
Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.
Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.
Explore stylish fashion with Ruth Langsford and spread the cost in 4, interest-free. Discover classic basics, vibrant prints and effortlessly chic styles. Tune in and transform your look today!
Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.
Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.
Discover fresh inspiration with New Season Garden Stories. Explore vibrant plants, expert tips, and creative ideas to help your garden thrive this spring. Tune in for your garden makeover!
